name: mewtwonite-x
effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo X.
short_effect: Held: Allows Mewtwo to Mega Evolve into Mega Mewtwo X.

flavor_text.sword-shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Mewtwo hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
